trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of data source names.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> classe é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> que normalmente é referenciado pelo objeto de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: The data source names that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method are of components from the container of the specified context that are valid data sources.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados nomes que são retornados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método são dos componentes que são fontes de dados válido do contêiner do contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> método obtém um valor que indica se os nomes de fonte de dados retornados são uma lista exclusiva de valores possíveis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the data source names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> método obtém um valor que indica se os nomes de fonte de dados são um conjunto padrão de valores que podem ser escolhidos em uma lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método converte o objeto especificado para o tipo nativo do conversor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method gets a value indicating whether this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método obtém um valor que indica se este <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> pode converter um objeto no tipo de origem especificado para o tipo nativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method indicates whether the specified component implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> método indica se o componente especificado implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter" /> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> classe quando a classe é referenciada por um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object for which conversion is being requested.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is a string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method can only convert from a string, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> only returns `true` when `sourcetype` is a string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método só pode converter de uma cadeia de caracteres, portanto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> retorna apenas `true` quando `sourcetype` é uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> does not use the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> não usa o `context` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that specifies the culture of the <c>value</c> parameter.
The object to convert.
Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is returned as a string.
If the `value` parameter has a type of string, it is returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: Se o `value` parâmetro tem um tipo de cadeia de caracteres, ele é retornado como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` é `null`, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") será retornado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, uma <xref:System.NotSupportedException> será gerada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method does not use the `context` or `culture` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método não usa o `context` ou `culture` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is other than a string or <see langword="null" />.

An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Returns a list of the available data source names.

A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> containing the names of the controls that implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface and are available for use in the given context.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method creates a list of the names of the components that are valid data sources in the container of the object that is specified by the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método cria uma lista dos nomes dos componentes que são fontes de dados válido no contêiner do objeto que é especificado pelo `context` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: It then converts that list to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Ele converte essa lista para um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
Always <see langword="false" />.

If you derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to return an exclusive list of data source names, also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method to return `true` when the data source name list is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Se você derivar uma classe a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> também substituir o método para retornar uma lista exclusiva de nomes de fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> método para retornar `true` quando a lista de nome de fonte de dados é exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O `context` parâmetro não for usado o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of data source names that can be picked from a list.
Always <see langword="true" />.
The `context` parameter is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O `context` parâmetro não for usado o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> interface.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="component" /> is a valid data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method considers the `component` parameter to be a valid data source if it implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> método considera o `component` parâmetro seja uma fonte de dados válido se ele implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method should be overridden by controls that need to further investigate a given component to decide whether it should be returned in the list of standard values.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> método deve ser substituído por controles de que precisa para investigar um determinado componente para decidir se deve ser retornado na lista de valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a control works with only <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> data sources, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> should return <see langword="true" /> only for those components that are <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um controle funciona apenas com <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> fontes de dados, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> deve retornar <see langword="true" /> somente para os componentes que são <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> objetos.
